dataproccessing
Class DatabaseLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      dataproccessing.DatabaseLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class DatabaseLoader
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

The class that interacts with the vocab, verb and Highscore xml database. It keeps the HashMaps of vocab words separated by unit as well as the highscores by game. It also keeps an arraylist of verbs

Author:
Ashwin Sekar
